info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 12:00AM CDT until August 03 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 1200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marquand to Buckhorn to near Saco, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marquand, Buckhorn, and Saco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
